Package de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio

Class NioNetworkSocket

java.lang.Object
de.oth.blocklib.networking.nio.NioNetworkSocket
class NioNetworkSocket
extends java.lang.Object
Implements common operations for a datagram socket.
Author:
Matthias Wagner

      private void notifySendActivity​(java.net.InetSocketAddress remoteAddress)
      Notifies ConnectionActivityListeners that data was sent to the given remote address.
      Parameters:
      remoteAddress - the remote's address deciding which listeners to notify or null to notify everyone
